data.title: Wolters Kluwer - Combining Domain Expertise With Advanced Technology
data.meta_description: Wolters Kluwer is a global provider of professional information, software solutions, and services.
data.text:
Health

Innovative solutions for better health outcomes

Supporting professionals across the healthcare ecosystem with leading technology to provide the best evidence-based patient care.

Tax & Accounting

Expert solutions to optimize tax and accounting processes

Enabling professionals in tax and accounting firms of all sizes to grow, manage, and protect their business and their clientsâ€™ businesses.

ESG

Global enterprise software

Providing corporations around the world with enterprise software solutions for corporate performance management, ESG, EHS, risk management, and assurance.

Finance

Technology-enabled services and solutions

Helping regulated financial departments, institutions, and banks meet their obligations to external regulators.

Compliance

Expert compliance services and software solutions

Enabling organizations to ensure adherence with ever-changing regulatory obligations and manage governance, risk and compliance.

Legal

Legal and regulatory insights and solutions

Helping legal professionals in law firms, General Counsel offices and corporate legal departments with to streamline legal research, analysis, and workflows.
